item.title: The Truth Shall Come Out
item.description: So a select committee has finally been formed to investigate Benghazi…20 months and one Presidential election after the attack. There are STILL questions that we are still awaiting honest answers for. I think the family members of the victims deserve answers more. In no particular order: Why did we still have people in Benghazi after every other foreign entity, including the Red Cross, left due to safety concerns? Why was security not increased after previous attacks on the consulate in April 2012 and on the International Red Cross office in May 2012?
